medium: Cotton, metal, metallic thread, synthetic thread, plant fibers
title: Dress
description: predominantly black dress with pink, yellow, green, and purple geometric embroidery at torso and sleeve cuffs; also decorating torso and sleeve cuffs are metal coins, metal amulets, and brown plant material; neck opening is circular with vertical slit down back closed with metal buttons; metallic silver thread decorates dress bottom, sleeve cuffs, and waist
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
